title: Hybrid ADDIE-RAD-Based Local Culture Preservation and Multilingual Learning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and intermediate-level expertise in social sciences
context.additional_context: Practice-centered design to enhance job relevance for current practitioners, optimized for smartphone-based accessibility

learning_goals: Learners can accurately recall key vocabulary at over 80% accuracy by translating local folktales into three languages (Korean, English, and regional dialect).
Learners can connect cultural values (Pancasila principles) to real-life applications at over 70% proficiency using interactive features of digital platforms.
Learners can demonstrate 90% completion proficiency within four weeks in utilizing multimedia content (text/image-based) of an application through formative assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
